description: Seed manifest for AmexingWeb database initialization
author: Amexing Development Team

seeds.name: 000-seed-rbac-roles
seeds.description: Create system roles for RBAC (SuperAdmin, Admin, Client, Department Manager, Employee, Guest)

seeds.name: 000-seed-rbac-permissions
seeds.description: Create system permissions for RBAC (users.*, clients.*, bookings.*, etc.)

seeds.name: 000-seed-superadmin-user
seeds.description: Create initial SuperAdmin user from environment variables (DEV_SUPERADMIN_EMAIL, DEV_SUPERADMIN_PASSWORD)

seeds.name: 001-seed-service-types
seeds.description: Seed initial service types (Aeropuerto, Punto a Punto, Local)

seeds.name: 005-seed-rates
seeds.description: Ensure existing 4 rates have color field (Econ√≥mico, First Class, Green Class, Premium)

seeds.name: 006-seed-vehicle-types
seeds.description: Seed 6 vehicle types from vehicleTypes.json (SEDAN, VAN, SUBURBAN, SPRINTER, MODEL 3, MODEL Y)

seeds.name: 007-seed-services-from-csv
seeds.description: Import 837 services from Estructura_Tarifario.csv with POI+serviceType matching and batch processing

notes: Seeds are executed in order specified by 'order' field
Dependencies must be listed in 'dependencies' array
Idempotent seeds can be run multiple times safely
Use 'enabled: false' to skip a seed without removing it
Environment-specific seeds only run in specified environments
RBAC seeds (000-*) MUST run first to create roles, permissions, and SuperAdmin user
Set DEV_SUPERADMIN_EMAIL and DEV_SUPERADMIN_PASSWORD in .env before running seeds
